plays.text: Penalty to Scott Niedermayer 2 minutes for Holding Pavol Demitra
Penalty to Teemu Selanne 2 minutes for Tripping Aaron Miller

Penalty to Joe DiPenta 2 minutes for Hooking Dustin Brown
Goal scored by Michael Cammalleri assisted by Pavol Demitra AND Lubomir Visnovsky

Penalty to Lubomir Visnovsky 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Tom Kostopoulos 2 minutes for Holding Rob Niedermayer
Penalty to Eric Belanger 2 minutes for Holding Andy McDonald
Goal scored by Andy McDonald assisted by Todd Fedoruk AND Scott Niedermayer
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Holding Corey Perry
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for Hooking Craig Conroy
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by Alexander Frolov AND Eric Belanger
